entry.title: Running on the Sun
entry.summary: Feature-length documentary about the 1999 Badwater Ultramarathon. This legendary, epic, 135 mile running race travels non-stop in the heat of...
entry.content: Feature-length documentary about the 1999 Badwater Ultramarathon. This legendary, epic, 135 mile running race travels non-stop in the heat of Summer from Badwater in Death Valley (elev. 282 feet below sea level) to Whitney Portal on Mt. Whitney (elev. 8360 feet). Field size is limited to up to 90 runners.
